channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Former DOJ Official: Trump’s Crypto Pardon Is Unprecedented Corruption
item.description: A report from the International Consortium of Investigative Journalists (ICIJ) indicates that Binance is still involved with the processing of illicit money.

item.title: The best Xbox controller to buy right now
item.description: Editor’s note: Black Friday doesn’t officially take place until Friday, November 28th; however, if you want to shop ahead of time, we’ve rounded up the best early Black Friday deals you can already get. We live in a golden age of controllers. The gamepads on the market now are of higher quality, more versatile, and more customizable than […]

item.title: 5 things that annoy me about iPhones
item.description: I love my iPhone, but there are certain aspects of its hardware and software that I'm not so keen on.

item.title: I ran a group test of 8 cordless vacuums – this is the vac that performed best against pet hair
item.description: If you're overwhelmed with pet fuzz, this is the vacuum for you.

item.title: Tesla receives ride-hailing permit in Arizona in last required step to launch robotaxi service
item.description: Tesla received a ride-hailing permit this week from Arizona regulators, opening the door for the automaker to begin operating a robotaxi service in the state. A spokesperson with Arizona Department of Transportation told TechCrunch the automaker applied for a Transportation Network Company permit on November 13. Tesla has met the requirements to operate as a […]...

item.title: Never mind SanDisk’s tiny SSD: here are five even smaller USB flash drives you can plug into your MacBook Pro and forget
item.description: These tiny USB Flash Drives can be plugged in your MacBook Pro laptop and forgotten about.

item.title: Why the New ‘Project Hail Mary’ Trailer Has That Big ‘Spoiler’ in It
item.description: Author and producer Andy Weir talks about revealing Ryan Gosling's co-star in the new film.

item.title: Hugging Face CEO says we’re in an ‘LLM bubble,’ not an AI bubble
item.description: Hugging Face co-founder and CEO Clem Delangue says all the attention is on LLMs, but smaller, specialized models will make sense in many use cases going forward.

item.title: Data centers are surging—but so are the protests against them
item.description: Between March and June, an estimated $98 billion in data center projects were blocked or delayed, according to a new report. Across the country, data center demand and construction have been skyrocketing throughout 2025.

item.title: ‘Quiet, Piggy’: Trump’s viral insult has already become an anti-MAGA clapback
item.description: A clip circulating online this week shows Trump telling a reporter who asked a question he didn’t like: “Quiet, Piggy.” Now, social media users are in hog heaven with piggish memes for the president. Pigs famously have thick skin and Donald Trump does not. It’s just one of myriad distinctions between the cloven-hoofed barnyard animal and America’s 47th president....

item.title: Waymo lance son robotaxi sans supervision dans cinq autres villes américaines
item.description: La jeune pousse Waymo a annoncé mardi le lancement de son service de robotaxi entièrement autonome-sans superviseur dans le véhicule-dans cinq villes supplémentaires, dont Miami, dès mardi, portant le total à dix.

item.title: Test du 3i S10 Ultra : le premier robot aspirateur qui recycle son eau sale
item.description: Le 3i S10 Ultra arrive sur le marché de l'aspirateur-robot avec une promesse inédite : recycler automatiquement son eau sale et produire de l'eau propre à partir de l'humidité ambiante. Est-ce que ça marche ? Voici le test.

item.title: Intelligence artificielle | Le patron de Google met en garde contre un éclatement de la bulle
item.description: Chaque entreprise serait lourdement affectée si la bulle de l’intelligence artificielle (IA)venait à éclater, a averti lundi Sundar Pichai, le patron d’Alphabet, maison mère de Google, alors que les investissements sont frénétiques dans le secteur.

item.title: DJI’s New Action Camera Makes It Even Harder for GoPro to Catch Up
item.description: The Osmo Action 6 brings the action cam closer to the typical vlogging camera.

item.title: 12,000-Year-Old Artifact Depicts a Goose Having Sex With a Woman
item.description: Archaeologists in Israel have discovered the oldest known figurine representing human-animal, uh, interactions.

item.title: "No one wants this" - Microsoft exec hit with barrage of abuse after celebrating Windows evolution to become an "agentic OS"
item.description: Microsoft’s agentic Windows OS announcement triggered online backlash as users worry AI tools and cloud features may disrupt workflows.

item.title: Meta Learns That Nothing Is a Monopoly If You Just Wait Long Enough
item.description: On a long enough timeline, what is a monopoly anyway?

item.title: Prepare For the ‘Legend of Zelda’ Movie With the 1989 Cartoon on Tubi
item.description: If you've ever wondered whether the 'Legend of Zelda' cartoon is actually bad or secretly charming, Tubi has got you covered.

item.title: Watch This Wolf Pull Off an Absolutely Genius Crab Trap Heist
item.description: The researchers describe it as a "potential" example of tool use among wolves.

item.title: Google Antigravity : la nouveauté aussi importante que Gemini 3
item.description: Tout le monde regarde Gemini 3 et ses scores délirants sur les benchmarks. C'est une erreur. La véritable annonce de Google aujourd'hui s'appelle Antigravity. Ce n'est plus un chatbot, c'est un environnement où l'IA a les mains libres sur votre terminal et votre navigateur. Et ça change tout.

item.title: These are the 10 best Android apps of the year, according to Google
item.description: The 10 best Android apps of the year have just been honored by Google – here's the full list and how to download them.

item.title: La fin de l’« écran bleu de la mort », Windows 11 apprend à se réparer tout seul avec cinq nouvelles fonctions de récupération
item.description: Microsoft profite d'Ignite 2025 pour dévoiler cinq nouvelles fonctionnalités de récupération pour Windows 11. Restauration à un point précis, réinstallation cloud, gestion à distance depuis Intune : l'objectif est clair, réduire drastiquement les temps d'arrêt après un crash système.

item.title: I write about laptops all year long. See the top 6 early Black Friday laptop deals (so far).
item.description: Mashable's senior shopping reporter (and laptop expert) rounds up the best early Black Friday laptop deals across retailers like Amazon and Best Buy.

item.title: The highly-rated Nikon Z5 II just dropped to a record-low price at Adorama
item.description: The 4.5-star Nikon Z5 II drops to $1596.95 at Adorama
